definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: An Initiative Mode of Group-Buying Online;
sentences.chinese: 烟管鱼科的一个模式属。

sentences.english: He silently applied the tube to his lips .
sentences.chinese: 他默默地把烟管递到嘴里。

sentences.english: A pipe gives a wise man time to think and a fool something to stick in.
sentences.chinese: 烟管给聪明人灵感，给笨蛋口里一个棍子。

sentences.english: Boilers may be broadly classified as shell, fire-tube and water-tube types.
sentences.chinese: 人们一般把它分为锅壳型，烟管型和水冷管型等类型。

sentences.english: It burns smoke-free ethanol which needs no flue.
sentences.chinese: 它燃烧乙醇，无烟也无需烟管。

sentences.english: One day, a friend offered her a pipe and opium.
sentences.chinese: 一天，一个朋友给了她一根烟管和鸦片。

sentences.english: A side suction cover of a foldable smoke pipe is in correspondence with a material charging and discharging opening of the furnace body.
sentences.chinese: 折叠式烟管的侧吸罩与炉体的物料进出口相对。

sentences.english: Placed beside an opium pipe was a small shoe, a shoe for a bound foot.
sentences.chinese: 在鸦片烟管旁放着一双小鞋，一双给裹足人穿的小鞋。

sentences.english: Our Factory specializes in standard level fire tubes used in the EU style Wall-Hung Gas Boiler.
sentences.chinese: 本厂专业生产欧款壁挂炉标准水平排烟管的企业。

sentences.english: He bought some roach clips and hashish pipes at the head shop .
sentences.chinese: 在麻药品店里他买了些蟑螂夹子和烟管。

sentences.english: The lighter poised over the mouth of his pipe.
sentences.chinese: 打火机停在了他的烟管嘴的上方。

sentences.english: But the nargileh too has fallen victim to the ban.
sentences.chinese: 然而这个水烟管也成为了此项禁令的牺牲品。

definition: to have smoke billowing from a fireplace or stove (due to a blockage in the chimney)
tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)
a forced draft (of wind, for smelting metal)/blast (in blast furnace)/bellows/to draw air using bellows
